name: kaavio
description: Diagram viewer and editor for biological pathways.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ es5/ esnext/ && npm-run-all -s build:css -p build:assets -s build:ts
scripts.expected: for f in ./test/inputs/*.json; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.json//` && echo "Converting $f to SVG and generating checksum..." && cat "$f" | node test/dummy-cli.js | tee "$base_path.svg" | bin/sha1sumup > "$base_path.svg.sha1sum" || break; done
scripts.prepare-broken: npm run bundle && npm run build:dist:node && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false edges && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false filters && ./bin/kaavio bundle defs --build false && ./bin/kaavio bundle markers --build false && npm run build && npm run test && npm run expected
scripts.prepare-disabled: npm run bundle && npm run build:dist:node && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false edges && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false filters && ./bin/kaavio bundle defs --build false && ./bin/kaavio bundle markers --build false && npm run build
scripts.prepare: ALLE_DIR='../../../'; if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d $ALLE_DIR/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...' && (cd $ALLE_DIR && npm run 'kaavio:build'); else npm run build; fi
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm i --package-lock-only && ALLE_DIR='../../../' && if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d $ALLE_DIR/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...' && (cd $ALLE_DIR && npm run 'kaavio:test'); else npm run test; fi
scripts.postpublish: TAG="$(jq -r .version package.json)" && git commit -am "Bump to version $TAG" && git tag -a $TAG -m "Published version $TAG" && git push origin $TAG
scripts.testBuild: echo 'testBuild requires rsync and the gpml2pvjson NPM package' && npm run build:ts:es5 && ./bin/kaavio bundle ./test/dummy-themes/silly.json && tsc --jsx react ./test/dummy-themes/silly/theme.tsx && rsync -rIl --existing ../gpml2pvjson-js/test/expected/ test/inputs/
scripts.test: echo 'get in-browser tests working' && npm-run-all --silent -p test:*
scripts.test:checksums: for f in ./test/inputs/*.json; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.json//` && cat "$f" | node test/dummy-cli.js | bin/sha1sumup -c "$base_path.svg.sha1sum" || (echo '' && echo "Checksum failed for $base_path.svg. Can kaavio convert it without throwing an error?" && cat "$f" | node test/dummy-cli.js >/dev/null && echo '' && echo "  Kaavio converts $base_path.svg without throwing an error, but we still need to find out why the checksums do not match." && echo '') || (echo '' && echo "  Kaavio throws an error when converting $base_path.svg." && exit 1) || break; done
scripts.test-broken:jest: echo 'Get the jest test(s) working (again-ish).' && jest
scripts.test-broken:e2e: npm run serve && npm run serve:bundle
scripts.watch: rm -rf es5/ esnext/ && npm-run-all -s build:css -p build:assets -s build:ts -p watch:*

author: WikiPathways team
